Coverage:
Small coverage of the East Denver area SW of DIA. 
   Repeater Coverage Map
Features: E-power (batt).  2 meter and 70cm channel steerable remote bases.
Links: Full-time to the  The Fun Machine System .
Notes: Can be linked to various local repeater systems via the remote base(s). Echolink connects restricted. Email me to be added to the authorized list.  The system may be occupied in the Southern Colorado area for a formal net or ARES activity.
Nets:
APRS Net: Sun at 19:00. 
Region 5 District 2 ARES Net: Sun at 19:30. 
Statewide ARES Net: Sun at 20:00. 
Region 5 District 1 ARES Net: Mon at 19:00. 
RGARC Net: Wed at 19:00.
